New York Times ' White House correspondent Maggie Haberman on Saturday fired back at President Donald Trump , after [V: being] viciously attacked by the commander - in - chief in an early series of tweets over an article about Michael Cohen .

[ARG1: New York Times ' White House correspondent Maggie Haberman] on Saturday fired back at President Donald Trump , after being [ARGM-MNR: viciously] [V: attacked] [ARG0: by the commander - in - chief] [ARGM-LOC: in an early series of tweets over an article about Michael Cohen] .
